H0.text: where was held the first session of muslim league. Dhaka

H1.text: where was held the first session of muslim league. Aligarh

H3.text: where was held the first session of muslim league. Lucknow

A4.text: the All-India Muslim League was formed in Dhaka, Bangladesh

A5.text: the first stage of its formation was the meeting held at Lucknow in September 1906
